approval_data.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks

requirements.title: Create Task
requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task by providing a text description. The description field should accept a minimum of 1 character and a maximum of 255 characters.  Upon successful creation, the task should be saved and the user notified (e.g., a success message).

requirements.title: View Task List
requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all created tasks.  Each task in the list should display its text description. The list should be sorted by creation date, with the most recently created tasks appearing first.

requirements.title: Application Load Time
requirements.description: The application shall load within 3 seconds on a standard internet connection (e.g., 10 Mbps download speed) on a modern browser (e.g., Chrome, Firefox). This includes the initial page load and any subsequent data retrieval.

requirements.title: Application Security
requirements.description: The application shall protect user data from unauthorized access. This includes, but is not limited to, using HTTPS for all communication, protecting against common web vulnerabilities (e.g., XSS, CSRF), and securely storing any sensitive information (e.g., user credentials, if applicable).
